Summaries.eng: Miyama Suzune wishes to be an idol like Amasawa Akari, an idol who got her start through the Selection Project reality show. Suzune had been stricken with illness since she was little, but she listened to Akari's music often in her hospital room. Akari's voice gave Suzune smiles and courage, which encouraged Suzune to want to inspire others in the same way. In her last summer of junior high, Suzune decides to enter the seventh Selection Project to make her dreams come true.
Summaries.jpn:
毎年、夏に開催され、アイドルを志す少女たちにとって
夢を掴むための最大の登竜門と言われる全国アイドルオーディションリアリティショー
「SELECTION PROJECT」
今年で第７回目を迎えるこのオーディションを勝ち抜いた少女たちは、
皆等しく華々しいデビューを飾り、国内外を問わず人気を博している。

全国アイドルオーディションリアリティショーでは、
北海道、東北、北関東、南関東、近畿、中部、中国、四国、九州・沖縄の
全国９つの地区予選を勝ち抜いた少女たちが、本選オーディションに挑む姿を
ドキュメンタリー映像やLIVE配信で追いかけていく。

そして少女たちの勝敗を決めるのは、
リアリティショーを視聴しているユーザーからの投票のみ。
数多くの投票を受けて、オーディションを勝ち抜き、
アイドルとしてデビューする栄冠を手にするのはいったい誰なのか！？

同じ夢を目指す戦友であり、ライバルでもある少女たちの
青春熱血オーディションバトルが今、幕を開ける！

Summaries.eng: The Block Finals for Selection Project, an idol competition show, are about to begin, and Suzune Miyama is ready to take the stage!
Summaries.jpn:
アイドルを夢みる中学生・美山鈴音は、大人気アイドルオーディションリアリティーショー
「SELECTION PROJECT」を勝ち上がり、いよいよ全国予選決勝に挑む。
鈴音の挑戦がいま幕を開ける！

Titles.eng: The Girls on a Journey to Tomorrow
Titles.jpn: 明日へ旅立つ少女たち

Summaries.eng: Suzune, still dismayed by the results in the finals of the selections, receives a surprise visit from Seira. Hoping to cheer her up, Seira takes her around town, but Suzune discovers she might not be ready to sing again yet.
Summaries.jpn:
予選決勝で敗退し、いつもの日常に戻った鈴音。
彼女の前に突然現れてショッピングに連れ出すセイラ。
全国各地の予選突破者が本選会場に集結する中、鈴音は何を想うのか？

Titles.eng: If Singing Vanished From the World
Titles.jpn: もしこの世界から歌が消えたら

Summaries.eng: The hopeful idols, now accommodated in the dorm, split into three teams to face a direct confrontation in the first round. Suzune's partner however doesn't seem very interested in working with her...
Summaries.jpn:
プロのアイドルデビューを目指し、
９人のファイナリストが遂に全国から集結！
いよいよ本選の幕が開ける！
注目の一次審査の課題は…チームによるオーディション⁉

Titles.jpn: ラッシュ！クラッシュ！スプラッシュ！

Summaries.eng: It's the dance team's turn to shine! But tensions rise when the passionate Hiromi takes charge, and the other members cannot keep up. They need to work together to perfect their routine and create a catchy name.

Titles.jpn: 有頂天トラブルメーカー

Summaries.eng: The Band will be the last to play, but there is a problem: they are not ready. Uta wants to do it at once and Shiori wants to polish her bassline, what will gentle Mami Mako do?
Summaries.jpn:
『楽器』を選んだ詩・栞・まこは周りが
一次審査を突破したことに焦りを感じていた。
まとまらないチーム、迫る期限、悩む3人。
ついに最初の脱落者が出てしまうのか…？

Summaries.eng: Round 2 starts with an announcement: it's a swimsuit round! Everyone is excited to go to the beach and get some screams, except Suzune, and no one but Rena seems to know why.

Titles.jpn: むき出しの想いはブルー

Summaries.eng: With Suzune threatening to drop out, the other eight idol candidates team up to bring her back to the group. A conversation with Rena and a letter from a fan might be what inspires her to continue.

Titles.eng: The True Tone of Her Heart

Summaries.eng:
The final judging task is to show off the original songs by the seven selected people.
It was revealed that the two people who will drop out will be decided by voting among the members,
The nine people who have deepened their relationship are terribly upset.

The heart of the legendary idol, Amazawa Akari, is in Suzune's chest ...!
Rena's heart sways in the shocking facts.
Her interview progresses, and her intentions for the nine dropouts gradually solidify ...

The results of the selection vote of the final examination are complete, and the members who will finally drop out have been decided.
A program that welcomes the development of turmoil.
And the members who returned to their hometown also started a certain project.

Titles.eng: One Little Step at a Time
Titles.jpn: 少しだけど 少しずつ

Summaries.eng:
Nine people who restarted as an idol group "9-tie".
I want to deliver our songs without anybody missing
I started a live performance on the street, but it didn't go as I expected ...

Titles.eng: The Feelings We Want You to Know
Titles.jpn: あなたに届けたい想い

Summaries.eng:
If you win 2 million ales in the live broadcast that made your debut,
The dream of becoming an idol as "9-tie" comes true!
As each of them got excited, something happened to her body ...

A light that pushes Suzune's back. Sunny reveals the secret of the light to Rena. A companion who believes and waits for two people.
Will the final live with the idol debut succeed?
Whereabouts of the battle for dreams ...?
